DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to further demonstrate the safety , validity and quality of (sexual)life of vaginal operation for previous cesarean scar defect resection.
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life and Sexual Function of Vaginal Operation in The Treatment Of Previous Cesarean Scar Defect
DOC.detailed_description: collect all the patients'clinical information,use two questionnaire (the HRQoL and FSFI)to estimate patients' general healthy and sexual function before surgery and postoperation in 1 month,3 months and 6 months
DOC.criteria: preoperative diagnosed as PCSD hemodynamic stability irregular menstrual cycle using IUD complicating other disease also causing vaginal bleeding,such as endometrial polyp,submucous myoma and functional uterine bleeding.
DOC.keyword: Uterine Scar From Previous Cesarean Delivery
